name: Robot Survival (ASpiritoso)
description: The year is 2,234 and you are a stellar drone, a powerful reconnaissance robot built by the humans of Earth to survey terrestrial bodies for their resources. You've stumbled upon a planet containing valuable crystals that can be used to make extremely efficient starship fuel. Nevertheless, the local inhabitants of the terrestrial body do not plan to let you return to the humans with a report of the crystals' existence.... survive!
